jd: From: KHUSHI, pinakastaffing khushi@pinakastaffing.com Reply to: khushi@pinakastaffing.com Looking for GIS Project Manager for client Washington State : REMOTE. Let me know if you can help. Client : Washington State Department of TransportationProject name: Senior Level IT Project Manager - WSDOT Technology Improvement ProjectsExpert Level PM position Mandatory requirement:10 years of PM 6 years of GIS ESRI technologies.• Prior IT Project Management experience leading a project requiring Washington Technology Solutions (WaTech) oversight, providing all gated funding documentation and meeting WaTech’s IT standards, policies, and guidelines.• Prior IT Project Management experience managing projects involving modernizing a transportation agency’s Linear Referencing System with ESRI’s GIS technologies • Prior IT Project Management experience with WSDOT IT projects.• Prior experience in the creation of Request For Information (RFI), Request For Proposal (RFP), and Request For Quotation (RFQ) solicitations• Prior IT Project Management migrating applications to a more modern, vendor hosted Software as a Service (SaaS) or Commercial Off The Shelf (COTS) solution.• A current certification as a Project Management Institute – Project Mangement Professional (PMI-PMP).• Lean Six Sigma Green Belt certification is desirable Work Schedule, Location & Travel Expectations The following expectations on work schedule, work location, and travel expectations:• Monday through Friday, up to forty (40) hours per week with some options for flex schedule,but ensuring at least six hours a day align with WSDOT’s standard operating hours of Monday through Friday, 8:00 am to 4:30 PM Pacific time.• Work remotely from the candidate’s home office within the United States.• In-person work at the WSDOT Offices in Tumwater, WA 98501 for up to a week at a time as often as every three months to understand manual processes and information resources (this travel will be at the contractor’s expense).
